channel.title: (REQ) Banner 4 my new site
channel.description:
ok, i need a banner for my new site, and well, i aint good at banners, ok, so it should say Hellsing on it, and also have a picture of a silkroad thing, which can be found at www.silkroadonline.net and it should have some more, smaller text saying SRO Guild Forums. so, heres what i basicly want...
Text:Hellsing Sub-Text:SRO Guild Forums Border: dont care Render: Something to do with silkroad online Size: look here: hellsingsroguild.tk or s4.invisionfree.com/hellsingsroguild please dont delete this link, i am not advertising it, it is simply a website for my guild on silkroad, i posted it to give ideas on what the banner i am requesting should look like.
